1544800.name: Kabaret Demo
1544800.description:
Stay awhile and listen. Maybe have a cup of tea while you're here.

Cursed into a monster, Jebat journeys into a realm called the “Alam”. Taken in by the charismatic owner of Kabaret, known only as The Caretaker, Jebat is tasked with providing tasseomancy services for the dwellers of the Kabaret in an effort to gather information on the monster who cursed him.

Each of the mythical creatures who visits the Kabaret represents a taboo in Southeast Asian culture. Listen to their unique stories, give advice through tasseomancy, and find a way to turn Jebat back to human.


Features:
  • Perform tea reading for patrons of the Kabaret.
  • Play Southeast Asian traditional games like Congkak, Gasing, and Guli.
  • Speak to a wide cast of monsters native to the Southeast Asian folklores.
  • Featuring music composed by Sambasunda from Indonesia.
